segments.text: Jenny , I was wondering ... if you .. eh are you busy this Friday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , Friday I have a class , right after work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , what about Saturday ? Are you free then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Saturday my parents are coming to town . What ’ s up ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about tonight ? Do you have plans tonight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , do you want to go and do something ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , yes , I want to take you to dinner .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , that sounds great . How about 6 o ’ clock ?
segments.speaker: S2
